animalCare.title: Air quality Solutions for Animal care

tvApp.title: AQI TV App
tvApp.description: Display monitor data on a large TV screen with the AQI TV app. Compare real-time and historical data, and access 24/7 remote monitoring to stay updated on AQI levels. Data availability to everyone.

webDashboard.title: AQI Web-Dashboard
webDashboard.description: Analyze monitor data effortlessly with the AQI Web Dashboard. Access real-time and historic air quality data directly on our website, and explore global pollution trends with detailed analysis of the worlds most polluted cities and countries.

mobileApp.title: AQI Mobile App
mobileApp.description: Access air monitor data anytime with the AQI Mobile App. Enjoy real-time air quality updates through our accurate global data API and advanced features. With the AQI Mobile App, you have all the essential air quality information right at your fingertips.

railwayBanner.title: Air quality solutions for
railwayBanner.description: Lets embark on a journey towards cleaner, healthier railways for everyone with comprehensive air monitoring, purification, and data management solutions.

railwayFactors.title: Factors affecting air quality in
railwayFactors.description: Diesel-powered trains and crowded stations are fueling a rise in air pollutants at railway stations.

pm.title:
Particulate Matter
(PM2.5 and PM10)
pm.description: Dust from rail systems, and dust from maintenance activities.

vocs.title:
Volatile Organic
Compounds (VOCs)
vocs.description: Emits from solvents used in maintenance, and chemical interactions.

co.title:
Carbon
Monoxide (CO)
co.description: Emits from Diesel engines and incomplete combustion of fuel in trains.

nox.title:
Nitrogen
Oxides (NOx)
nox.description: Emits from diesel-powered locomotives and engines.

congested.title: Congested Stations
congested.description: Crowded stations result in poor ventilation, trapping pollutants and worsening air quality.

noise.title: Noise Pollution
noise.description: High noise level increases the stress levels in a person and can exacerbate respiratory problems.

diesel.title: Diesel Emissions
diesel.description: Diesel engines powered trains emit various pollutants such as nitrogen oxides (NOx) and particulate matter (PM).

railwayQuote.title: DO YOU KNOW?
railwayQuote.content1: According to the study by the California Air Resources Board (CARB), locomotives are projected to produce
railwayQuote.highlight: Over 640 tons per year of PM2.5 and Over 29,800 tons per year of NOx in California.
railwayQuote.content2: Such emissions not only deteriorate air quality within the state but can also contribute to global air pollution.

railwayConcern.title: Areas of
railwayConcern.description: Railway stations are bustling activity hubs and also pose significant air quality challenges.

stations.title: Railway Stations
stations.description: Train emissions and crowded conditions emit various pollutants that affect indoor and outdoor air quality.

cabins.title: Locomotive Cabins
cabins.description: Loco Pilot and other members are exposed to diesel emissions for extended periods.

tracks.title: Rail Tracks in Urban Areas
tracks.description: The passing trains suspend pollutants from tracks in residential and commercial areas.

yards.title: Maintenance Yards
yards.description: Train maintenance includes engines and other equipment repairs that release pollutants.

railwayRisk.title: Who is at
railwayRisk.description: The air quality issues at railway stations impact various groups, each facing unique risks.

passengers.title: Passengers
passengers.description: Children, older, and those with pre-existing respiratory conditions.

pilot.title: Loco Pilot
pilot.description: Prolonged exposure to pollutants trapped in the cabin.

residents.title: Nearby Residents
residents.description: Communities living close to railway tracks and stations.

workers.title: Railway Workers
workers.description: Long-term exposure while performing their duties.

railwaySolutions.title: Air quality
railwaySolutions.description: Identifying and addressing these risks is essential to safeguard everyone affected by the air quality challenges at railway stations.

monitors.title: Prana Air Ambient Air quality monitor
monitors.description: Integrating air quality monitoring systems is key to address concerns at railway stations.

purifier.title: Prana Air Outdoor Air Purifier
purifier.description: Implementing Air Purifiers can help in tackling air pollution effectively at railway stations.

features.feature1: Filter out PM2.5, NOx, and VOCs etc.
features.feature3: Reduces pollutant levels for better protection

display.title: Prana Air Customized TV Displays
display.description: Tailor the interface to your specific needs and Monitor air quality in real-time for immediate insights.

railwayEffects.title: The Effects of Air Pollution
railwayEffects.description: Poor Air Quality at railway stations affects every passenger and workers health causing various problems.

railwayClientele.description: Our partnerships with these renowned organizations reflect our commitment to excellence and innovation.

railwayIndustrial.description: Prana Air offers a diverse selection of smart, affordable, and remarkably precise air quality solutions, catering to various sectors, irrespective of their scale.

railwayFaq.description:
About Air Quality Solution for Railways
Have questions? Were here to help.

questions.q1: 1. Why air quality is a concern at railway stations?
questions.q2: 2. What are the health impacts of poor air quality at railway stations?
questions.q3: 3. Can air quality issues be managed without advanced solutions at railway stations?
questions.q4: 4. How does Prana Air Ambient Air Monitor improve air quality?

answers.a1: Trains operate with diesel engines and other activities emit various pollutants like PM2.5, NOx, carbon monoxide (CO), and volatile organic compounds (VOCs).
answers.a2: Exposure to poor air quality can cause or worsen respiratory problems including asthma, bronchitis, cardiovascular issues etc.
answers.a3: Managing air quality without advanced solutions is challenging. Air quality monitors and purifiers have a proactive approach to maintaining healthy air quality.
answers.a4: The Prana Air Ambient Air Monitor provides real-time data on pollutant levels, enabling timely responses and informed decision-making for air quality management.

industrial.title: Industrial
industrial.description: Regardless of how small or large a business is, Prana Air offers a wide choice of Smart, affordable, and highly accurate air quality solutions for various industries.

clientele.description: We are honored to work with so many well-known companies.
